scripts.build:angular-17: npm run build && cd packages/angular-17 && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:react: npm run build && cd packages/react && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && (cd packages/angular-17 && npm i && npm run build) && (cd packages/react && npm i && npm run build)
scripts.pack:core: cd packages/core && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.pack:react: cd packages/react && npm install $(ls -t ../core/*.tgz | head -1) && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular-17: cd packages/angular-17 && npm install $(ls -t ../core/*.tgz | head -1) && cd dist/components && npm pack
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack-core && npm run pack-react && npm run pack-angular-17
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint && npm run tsc

feat.description: A new feature that adds significant functionality or capability to the codebase.

fix.description: A bug fix that addresses a specific issue or improves existing functionality.

docs.description: Changes or additions to documentation, such as README updates or inline comments.

refactor.description: Code changes that improve structure or readability without altering functionality.

test.description: Adding new tests or updating existing ones to ensure code quality and coverage.

chore.description: Routine tasks or maintenance work, such as dependency updates or build script changes.

build.description: Modifications to the build system or external dependencies, such as upgrading build tools.

ci.description: Updates to CI configuration files or scripts to improve automation and deployment.
